ModMetaData.name: Simple changes (Vanilla)
ModMetaData.author: udong123
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]--- Simple changes ---[/h1]
I made this mod to improve the inconvenience of playing games based on my experience. It may be OP, or not very helpful.
Add Thing(s)
Improved Shelf (also applied small one) - No Quality that increase your colony wealth unnecessarily - Slowness when moving up the shelf is 10% (Existing 50%) - Standable ([strike]Can mine stone behind[/strike] or stay on shelf when pawn drafted etc..)
It's my first mod to practice modding/coding, so there may be no more update if I'm satisfied with game :P
If it is updated, the Unified edition and single edition will go up both. (This page would be Unified edition for vanilla.)
